attributes.additional_details: DWP-JSA advisers tell you to look at going on apprenticeships and tell you they are a good way to get the experience you need and if your under 25 the Govenment fund the collage whom then fund the employer, BUT if your 25+ the employer has to pay the collage!! We want the govenment to make it fair so employers will give 25+ a fair chance of an apprenticeship, employers want to save money, so under the age of 25 will be favoured, ADULTS lets get to 150,000 signatures and maybe our case will be heard.
